This bill will reauthorize the Maternal, Infant, and Early Childhood Home Visiting (MIECHV) program which allows families to partner with health, social service, and child development professionals to improve their health and well-being. Currently in Arkansas, there are nearly 41,000 families who are eligible to be served under this program.
